value_i18n.en_US: A state-of-the-art intranet solution, designed on the basis of international experience and best practices by the leading Italian specialist in the field, Giacomo Mason.

80% of the features.
20% of the time.

Intranet 80.20 is an ideal synthesis of functionality and design that represents a "significant shortcut" towards a final result of excellence: an 80% ready that needs only 20% customization and integration.

Learn More

The intranet in a box solution conceived and designed by Giacomo Mason, expert in internal communications, intranets and digital workplaces, who has brought together in this product domain experience and the best practices of the sector.
The only plug & play intranet built on the native back-office of both global market reference platforms: Liferay (Java) and Microsoft 365.
The implementation at the customers premises is handled directly by the Intranet 80.20 developers, not by third parties, guaranteeing the very best final result.

Ariadne is a company specialized in the creation of advanced digital platforms through the use of technologies and methodologies in continuous development.

Since the nineties, the company has created over 350 portals and is able to offer a consolidated expertise in Digital Engineering and in the development of enterprise-class systems with Liferay technology, Cloud Applications, AWS Cloud Native Apps.

Ariadne is a Liferay Platinum Partner. Through constant updating and decades of experience, the Ariadne team is able to support customer projects with portals, apps and platforms of excellence.
